1.comment: This was an awesome read. I'm not a developer myself but I enjoy knowing about the process. Keep it up! I will be reading more.
1.name: Courtney James

2.comment: Hey Courtney, from us talking, this still applies to you. You're a creative freelancer that specializes in custom made decor. I know you're just in the starting phases, but be on  the look out. You'll also need to know when to walk away from certain projects.
2.name: Elijah
